title: Chesa Boudin
added: In March 2020, Boudin declined to charge 20-year-old Dwayne Grayson after he was filmed striking a 68 year old Asian man over the head with a pole and shouting "I hate Asians", after his office convinced the victim to pursue [[restorative justice]].<ref>{{Cite web|last=Sernoffsky|first=Evan|last2=Serrano|first2=Alejandro|date=2020-03-02|title=SF district attorney withdraws charges against defendant in attack on Asian man|url=https://www.sfchronicle.com/crime/article/SF-Bayview-attack-Second-suspect-surrenders-to-15098296.php|access-date=2021-03-13|website=San Francisco
